Pagination

With Hyperlinks

  • Previous Page
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • ...
  • 12
  • Next Page 
<ul class="cmx-pagination">
    <li class="cmx-pagination__prev">
        <a href="#">
            <span class="cmx-icon-straight-arrow-left" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            <span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span>
        </a>
    </li>
    <li><a class="current" href="#">1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">4</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">5</a></li>
    <li class="cmx-pagination__spacer">...</li>
    <li><a href="#">12</a></li>
    <li class="cmx-pagination__next">
        <a href="#">
            <span class="cmx-icon-straight-arrow-right" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            <span class="sr-only">Next Page</span>
        </a>
    </li>
</ul>

With Buttons

  • ...
<ul class="cmx-pagination">
    <li class="cmx-pagination__prev">
        <button>
            <span class="cmx-icon-straight-arrow-left" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            <span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span>
        </button>
    </li>
    <li><button class="current">1</button></li>
    <li><button>2</button></li>
    <li><button>3</button></li>
    <li><button>4</button></li>
    <li><button>5</button></li>
    <li class="cmx-pagination__spacer">...</li>
    <li><button>12</button></li>
    <li class="cmx-pagination__next">
        <button>
            <span class="cmx-icon-straight-arrow-right" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            <span class="sr-only">Next Page</span>
        </button>
    </li>
</ul>

... and the SCSS / CSS code

.cmx-pagination {
    align-items: center;
    display:flex;
    justify-content: center;
    list-style: none;
    margin:0;
    padding: 0;

    > * { // should be a "li", but we leave it open just in case someone decides to use whatever tag
        
        margin: 0 8px;
        line-height: 1rem;
        
        > * { // should be a button or hyperlink
            background-color: transparent;
            border: 1px solid transparent;
            border-radius: $radius-2;
            color: $gray-light;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: inline-block;
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            font-size: $font-size-14;
            height: 24px;
            line-height: 1.375rem;
            padding: 0;
            text-decoration: none;
            text-align: center;
            transition: 200ms transform ease;
            width: 24px;

            &:hover,
            &:focus {
                border: 1px solid $bright-blue;
                text-decoration: none;
                color: $gray-light;
            }

            &.current {
                color: $true-white;
                background: $bright-blue;
            }
        }
    }

    $pnDimensions: 16px;

    &__prev,
    &__next {
        height: $pnDimensions;
        width: $pnDimensions;

        > *{
            height: $pnDimensions;
            width: $pnDimensions;
            line-height: $pnDimensions;
            color:$bright-blue;

            &:hover {
                border:none;
                color:$bright-blue;
                text-decoration: none;
                transform:scale(1.2);
            }
        }
    }

    &__spacer{
        >*{
            &:hover{
                border:none;
                text-decoration: none;
            }
        }
    }

}
.cmx-pagination {
    -webkit-box-align: center;
    -ms-flex-align: center;
    align-items: center;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
    -ms-flex-pack: center;
    justify-content: center;
    list-style: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.cmx-pagination>* {
    margin: 0 8px;
    line-height: 1rem;
}

.cmx-pagination>*>* {
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 1px solid transparent;
    border-radius: 2px;
    color: #636c72;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: inline-block;
    font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    height: 24px;
    line-height: 1.375rem;
    padding: 0;
    text-decoration: none;
    text-align: center;
    transition: 200ms -webkit-transform ease;
    transition: 200ms transform ease;
    transition: 200ms transform ease, 200ms -webkit-transform ease;
    width: 24px;
}

.cmx-pagination>*>*:hover,
.cmx-pagination>*>*:focus {
    border: 1px solid #3FA9F5;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #636c72;
}

.cmx-pagination>*>*.current {
    color: #FFF;
    background: #3FA9F5;
}

.cmx-pagination__prev,
.cmx-pagination__next {
    height: 16px;
    width: 16px;
}

.cmx-pagination__prev>*,
.cmx-pagination__next>* {
    height: 16px;
    width: 16px;
    line-height: 16px;
    color: #3FA9F5;
}

.cmx-pagination__prev>*:hover,
.cmx-pagination__next>*:hover {
    border: none;
    color: #3FA9F5;
    text-decoration: none;
    -webkit-transform: scale(1.2);
    transform: scale(1.2);
}

.cmx-pagination__spacer>*:hover {
    border: none;
    text-decoration: none;
}
